node.title: Ranking every Super Bowl, from worst to first
node.description: There have been some super games since 1967, but which one is the best?
node.content: ["The Super Bowl\u00a0is the climactic conclusion of the NFL season. Unlike in the other major U.S. team sports, the football league's championship is decided by a single game. Win or lose, there is no tomorrow.", "Until we witness Super Bowl XXX \u2014 a showdown slated for SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California on Feb. 13, 2022 \u2014 we're left with 55 other games to rank. Here's a look at every Super Bowl, from 1967 to 2021. We've ordered the games from worst to best based on how competitive and entertaining the match-ups turned out to be.", "Note: Teams are listed by the names they were known as at the time of their Super Bowl appearances.\u00a0"]
